title: F/S T206 Single Polar Bears for sale

posts.post_title: F/S T206 Single Polar Bears for sale
posts.post_content:
ALL SOLD.....Hi, I'm selling these Polar Bear cards for $18 each. Shipping is included. Would like to be paid with a paypal gift to [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url].
The backs are clean with no paper loss or writing. Send me an email if you want pic of the backs.

The Bergen and Moran are sold.

Joe
Hey Joe, I'll take whatever you've got left. Thank you!
